hero.label: Technical Excellence
hero.title: Lighting Design Studies
hero.subtitle: Transform your space with professional lighting analysis and design. Discover how proper lighting studies can revolutionize the atmosphere and functionality of any environment.

intro.title: The Art & Science of Lighting
intro.description: Lighting design is more than just placing fixtures. It's a comprehensive study that considers architecture, human psychology, energy efficiency, and aesthetic harmony. A professional lighting study analyzes every aspect of your space to create the perfect illumination strategy.
intro.impact: The right lighting design can transform a cold, uninviting space into a warm, welcoming environment. It can highlight architectural features, improve productivity, enhance mood, and even influence behavior.

optimized.title: Optimized Illumination
optimized.description: Achieve perfect light levels for every space and activity, ensuring comfort and functionality.

energy.title: Energy Efficiency
energy.description: Reduce energy consumption by up to 60% with strategic lighting design and smart controls.

mood.title: Mood Enhancement
mood.description: Create the perfect atmosphere for any occasion with layered lighting and color temperature control.

professional.title: Professional Results
professional.description: Get expert recommendations backed by photometric calculations and industry standards.

comparison.title: The Transformation
comparison.subtitle: See how professional lighting studies completely transform spaces from dull and uninviting to vibrant and welcoming.

beforePoints.1: Poor light distribution and dark corners
beforePoints.3: Uncomfortable atmosphere and low energy efficiency

afterPoints.2: Comfortable lighting with no glare or harsh shadows

analysis.title: Space Analysis
analysis.description: We begin by thoroughly analyzing your space, understanding its architecture, natural light sources, usage patterns, and specific requirements. Every detail matters in creating the perfect lighting solution.

design.title: Design Development
design.description: Our team develops a comprehensive lighting plan using industry-leading software. We consider fixture types, placement, color temperatures, and control systems to create the ideal lighting scheme.

simulation.title: 3D Visualization
simulation.description: Using advanced photometric software, we create realistic 3D renderings showing exactly how your space will look with the proposed lighting design. See the results before installation.

implementation.title: Implementation Support
implementation.description: We provide detailed specifications, product recommendations, and installation guidelines. Our team ensures seamless execution from design to final commissioning.

resources.title: Download Technical Resources
resources.description: Access our comprehensive lighting design guides, photometric data sheets, and technical specifications to help you make informed decisions.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Space?
cta.description: Let our lighting experts create a custom design study for your project. Contact us today for a professional consultation.

new-collection-page.heroDescription: Handcrafted lighting pieces that bring warmth and organic beauty to your space
new-collection-page.ctaDescription: Discover our handcrafted lighting solutions that combine natural materials with timeless design

natural-woven-collection.imageAlt: Natural woven lamp with organic texture
natural-woven-collection.title: Natural Woven Collection
natural-woven-collection.shortDescription: Handcrafted lamps featuring intricate woven patterns that create stunning light and shadow effects
natural-woven-collection.fullDescription: Our Natural Woven Collection showcases the beauty of traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design. Each piece is carefully handwoven using sustainable natural materials, creating unique patterns that cast beautiful ambient lighting. Perfect for adding warmth and texture to modern interiors.

gallery.image1: Natural woven table lamp with warm glow
gallery.image2: Elegant woven pendant lamp in living space

rattan-pendant-collection.imageAlt: Showroom display of rattan pendant lights
rattan-pendant-collection.title: Rattan Pendant Collection
rattan-pendant-collection.shortDescription: A stunning array of handwoven rattan pendants in various shapes and sizes for any space
rattan-pendant-collection.fullDescription: The Rattan Pendant Collection offers an extensive selection of ceiling lights, each uniquely crafted from premium rattan. From dramatic chandeliers to intimate pendants, this collection provides versatile lighting solutions that bring natural elegance to dining rooms, living areas, and commercial spaces.

gallery.image2: Close-up of perforated rattan pendant lights
gallery.image3: Floor lamps with natural rope shades

new-light-collection.imageAlt: New Light luxury rattan pendant light
new-light-collection.title: New Light Signature Collection
new-light-collection.shortDescription: Premium handcrafted lighting featuring intricate patterns and exceptional quality
new-light-collection.fullDescription: The New Light Signature Collection represents the pinnacle of artisan lighting design. Each piece is meticulously crafted using traditional weaving techniques combined with modern aesthetics. These statement pieces feature geometric patterns that create mesmerizing light effects, perfect for luxury residential and hospitality projects.

gallery.image1: Geometric pattern ceiling pendant in bedroom
gallery.image2: Layered rattan pendant with fabric shade
gallery.image3: Triple pendant arrangement over kitchen island
gallery.image4: Large statement pendant in living room

organic-table-floor-lamps.imageAlt: Organic table and floor lamps with natural shades
organic-table-floor-lamps.title: Organic Table & Floor Lamps
organic-table-floor-lamps.shortDescription: Elegant table and floor lamps with natural fiber shades for ambient task lighting
organic-table-floor-lamps.fullDescription: Our Organic Table & Floor Lamp Collection brings warmth to any corner of your home. Featuring natural fiber shades on stylish bases, these lamps provide soft, diffused lighting perfect for reading nooks, bedrooms, and living spaces. Each piece combines functionality with organic aesthetics.

gallery.image1: Classic table lamp with pleated natural shade
gallery.image2: Tripod floor lamp with burlap shade
gallery.image3: Modern table lamp with metal base
gallery.image4: Tall floor lamps with organic woven shades

collection-section.living-tomorrowDescription: Experience the future of sustainable living through innovative design.
collection-section.premium-finishesDescription: Discover our curated selection of materials and textures that define modern luxury.
collection-section.sustainable-designDescription: Building a better future with eco-conscious materials and energy-efficient solutions.
collection-section.smart-spacesDescription: Integrate intelligent systems that adapt to your lifestyle and enhance your daily experience.

about-us-page.heroSubtitle: For over a decade, we have been at the forefront of lighting innovation, transforming spaces with our carefully curated collection of premium lighting solutions. Our passion for quality and design excellence drives everything we do.
about-us-page.featuresSubtitle: We combine expertise, quality, and innovation to deliver exceptional lighting experiences.

features.title: Expert Lighting Design
features.description: Our certified lighting specialists provide professional calculations based on international lux standards, ensuring optimal illumination for every space. From residential to commercial projects, we deliver customized lighting solutions.

features.title: Premium Quality Products
features.description: We source only the finest lighting fixtures from world-renowned manufacturers. Each product undergoes rigorous quality control to ensure exceptional performance, durability, and aesthetic excellence that stands the test of time.

features.title: Fast Delivery Service
features.description: Experience efficient delivery within 5-7 business days with real-time tracking across all regions. Our logistics partners ensure your lighting fixtures arrive safely and on schedule, ready for installation.

features.title: Extended Warranty Coverage
features.description: All our premium lighting products come with comprehensive 3-5 year warranty coverage. We stand behind the quality of our products and provide responsive support throughout the warranty period.

features.title: Flexible Payment Options
features.description: Shop with confidence using our flexible payment methods including secure cash on delivery, bank transfers, Your convenience and security are our priority.

features.title: Energy Efficiency
features.description: Our LED lighting solutions deliver exceptional energy savings of up to 80% compared to traditional lighting. Reduce your carbon footprint while enjoying superior illumination quality and lower electricity costs.

about-us-page.categoriesSubtitle: Explore our comprehensive range of indoor and outdoor lighting solutions.

categories.title: Indoor Lighting
categories.description: Transform your interior spaces with our exquisite collection.

categories.title: Outdoor Lighting
categories.description: Illuminate your exterior spaces with our weather-resistant outdoor lighting solutions.

about-us-page.visionDescription: To be the leading provider of innovative lighting solutions in the region, setting new standards for quality, design excellence, and customer satisfaction. We envision a future where every space is transformed through the artistry of light, creating environments that inspire, comfort, and elevate the human experience.
about-us-page.missionDescription: To deliver exceptional lighting solutions that combine cutting-edge technology, timeless design, and sustainable practices. We are committed to understanding our clients' unique needs and exceeding their expectations through personalized service, expert guidance, and premium products that enhance both functionality and aesthetics.
about-us-page.ctaDescription: Discover our complete collection of premium lighting solutions and let our experts help you create the perfect ambiance for your project.

privacy-page.heroSubtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services to you:
items: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number, shipping address)
Browsing behavior and website usage data through cookies and analytics
Communication preferences and correspondence with our customer service team

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
items: Processing and fulfilling your orders, including shipping and delivery
Providing customer support and responding to your inquiries
Sending important updates about your orders and our services
Improving our website functionality and user experience
Analyzing trends and preferences to enhance our product offerings
Sending promotional materials and newsletters (with your consent)

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience:
items: Essential cookies for website functionality and security
Analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website
Marketing cookies for personalized advertising (with your consent)
Preference cookies to remember your settings and choices

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:
items: SSL encryption for all data transmission between your browser and our servers
Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
Restricted access to personal data on a need-to-know basis
Regular backups and disaster recovery procedures

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
items: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information
Withdraw consent for marketing communications at any time

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with:
items: Shipping and logistics partners to fulfill your orders
Payment processors to handle secure transactions
Analytics and marketing service providers (with anonymized data)
Legal authorities when required by law or to protect our rights
Business partners for joint marketing initiatives (with your explicit consent)

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately so we can delete such information.

policyChanges.title: Changes to This Policy
policyChanges.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the updated policy on our website and updating the 'Last Updated' date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this privacy policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us:

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our lighting products, need consultation, or want to explore our innovative lighting solutions, our team is here to help.

address.title: Our Address
address.street: 86 Abbas El-Akkad, Al Manteqah Al Oula,
